Class EditEventOperations

java.lang.Object
model.EditEventOperations
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEditEventOperations
public class EditEventOperations extends Object implements IEditEventOperations
Handles operations for editing events in a calendar model.

    • editEvent

      public void editEvent(ICalendarModel model, String subject, LocalDateTime from, String property, String newValue, ICalendarService.EditMode mode) throws Exception
      Edits an eventâ€™s property based on the specified mode.
      Specified by:
      editEvent in interface IEditEventOperations
      Parameters:
      model - The calendar model containing the events
      subject - The subject of the event to edit
      from - The start time for editing (null for ALL mode)
      property - The property to change (e.g., "subject", "start")
      newValue - The new value for the property
      mode - The edit mode (SINGLE, FROM, ALL)
      Throws:
      Exception - If the edit fails or no matching event is found
